SELECT COUNT(a.TMPLAT_ID) FROM COMTN_TMPLAT_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM005') c ON a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #{tmplatSeCode}
AND a.TMPLAT_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND c.CODE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT a.TMPLAT_ID , a.TMPLAT_NM , a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE , d.CODE_NM AS "tmplatSeCodeNm" , a.TMPLAT_COURS , a.USE_AT , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , c.USER_NM AS "lastUpdusrNm" , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" FROM COMTN_TMPLAT_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER c ON a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = c.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM005') d ON a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = d.CODE WHERE a.TMPLAT_ID = #{tmplatId}
